key.name: button-position
key.summary: Button position in the top panel
key.description: Controls whether and where buttons of maximized windows appear in the top panel. Possible values are: "before-name" to display buttons before the application name, "after-name" to display buttons after the application name, "within-status-area" to display buttons within the system status area, "after-status-area" to display buttons after the system status area and "hidden" to not show buttons at all.
